summary: Innovation encompasses the creation of intentional communities based on shared values. Through a bottom-up process, it balances order and creativity by aligning, validating, scaling, and spinning out efforts. Emulating the natural progression seen in ecosystems, innovation drives the emergence of new systems.
excerpt: This article explores how intentional communities can be designed through ecosystem architecture, involving alignment, validation, scaling, and eventually independence. It emphasizes balance between structure and creativity.
